thread.title: Tara Turner
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Tara Turner

author: Tara Turner
title: Tara Turner
text: We absolutely loved the vacation that Caitlyn Rowlands put together for us. We wouldn't have changed a thing. From start to finish, Costa Rican Vacations was first class and a joy to work with. Would absolutely recommend and would certainly use again!
